ows:ServiceIdentification.ows:Title: WPS server
ows:ServiceIdentification.ows:Abstract: WPS server developed by Geomatys for Constellation SDI.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Math:min
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return the min double from an array of double

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Coverage:computeVolume
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Create a pyramid / mosaic from the givencoverage. Created tiles are stored in the given Coverage store.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Math:power
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return first double raised to the power of the second (first^second).

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Coverage:reformat
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Change the sample type of a coverage.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Jts:touches
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns true if this geometry(geom1) touches the specified geometry(geom2).

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Coverage:straighten
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Straighten a coverage, make a coverage with regular scale and no rotation.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Jts:union
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Computes a union Geometry between the source geometry (geom1) and the other (geom2).

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Math:max
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return the max double from an array of double

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Jts:intersectionSurface
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Computes an intersection Geometry between the source geometry (geom1) and the other (geom2), and calculates the intersection surface.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Vector:maxlimit
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Limit a FeatureCollection returns to a maximum

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Image:reformat
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Change the sample type of a image.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Vector:startoffset
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Start FeatureSet iteration at given offset

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Math:median
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return the median of an array of double

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : String:concat
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Concatenate a string with a sufix and/or a prefix.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Vector:difference
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return the result FeatureCollection of Difference process

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Math:acos
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return arc cosinus of a double.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Vector:clipGeometry
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Clip a FeatureCollection with a geometry and return a resulting FeatureCollection

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Jts:covers
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns true if this geometry source (geom1) covers the specified geometry (geom2).

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Jts:equals2d
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return true if source geometry (geom1) is equals to the other geometry (geom2) .

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Math:log
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return the natural logarithm of a double

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Jts:difference
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Computes a difference Geometry between the source geometry (geom1) and the other (geom2).

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Io:delete
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Delete the inputed file or folder.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Math:sum
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return the sum of an array of double

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Io:createTempFolder
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Create a temporary folder.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Jts:crosses
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns true if this geometry source (geom1) crosses the specified geometry (geom2).

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Vector:clusterhull
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return the cluster hull based on FeatureCollection geometries

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Vector:convexhull
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return the convex hull based on FeatureCollection geometries

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Math:atan
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return arc tangent of a double.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Vector:nearest
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return the nearest Feature(s) in a FeatureCollection with the inputGeometry

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Jts:envelope
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns this Geometry bounding box.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Image:bandselect
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Select bands in a image.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Vector:sortby
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Sort a FeatureCollection

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Jts:centroid
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return the centroid point of an input JTS geometry

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Jts:isEmpty
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns true if this geometry source is an empty geometry.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Coverage:bandselect
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Select bands in a coverage.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Jts:within
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns true if this geometry source (geom1) is within the specified geometry (geom2).

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Math:divide
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Divide two double (first/second).

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Jts:convexHull
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return the convex hull geometry of the specified geometry.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Math:multiply
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Multiply two double .

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Vector:reproject
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return a FeatureCollection re-project into the target CRS

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Jts:lenght
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the length of this Geometry.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Script:evaluate
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Evaluate expression given in parameter w

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Vector:diffGeometry
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Compute difference between a FeatureCollection and a geometry. Return a FeatureCollection.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Jts:boundary
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return boundarty geometry of an input JTS geometry

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Math:sin
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the trigonometric sine of an angle in double.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Math:avg
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return the average value of an array of double

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Vector:union
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return the result FeatureCollection of Union process

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Math:asin
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return arc sinus of a double.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Math:floor
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the nearest lower or equals integer (in double) to the argument double.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Vector:merge
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Merge many FeatureCollection in one. The fist FeatureCollection found in the input Collection have his FeatureType preserved. The others will be adapted to this one.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Vector:retype
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Limit a FeatureCollection returns to a maximum

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Jts:coveredBy
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns true if this geometry source (geom1) is covered by the specified geometry (geom2).

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Vector:regroup
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return a Featrue Collection generated by the Regroup processEach different value of the given attribute name return a Feature.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Jts:intersects
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns true if this geometry source (geom1) intersects the specified geometry (geom2).

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Io:createTempFile
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Create a temporary file.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Math:ceil
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the nearest upper or equals integer (in double) to the argument double.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Math:round
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the closest long to the argument. The result is rounded to an integer by adding 1/2, taking the floor of the result, and casting the result to type long.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Jts:contain
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return true if source geometry (geom1) contains the specified geometry(geom2).

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Math:substract
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Substract two double (first - second).

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Vector:spatialjoin
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return the target FeatureCollection with source FeatureCollection attributes.The link between target and source depend of method used (Intersect or Nearest)

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Vector:clip
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return the result FeatureCollection of clipping

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Jts:intersection
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Computes a intersection Geometry between the source geometry (geom1) and the other (geom2).

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Math:absolute
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return the absolute value of a double.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Jts:overlaps
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns true if this geometry (geom1) overlaps the specified geometry (geom2).

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Vector:intersect
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return all Feature witch intersect the input geometry

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Math:add
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Adds two double.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Math:tan
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the trigonometric tangent of an angle in double.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Math:toRadian
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Converts an angle measured in degrees to an approximately equivalent angle measured in radians.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Jts:area
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return the area of a JTS geometry

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Vector:filter
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Apply a filter to a FeatureCollection

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Coverage:CoverageToVector
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Transform a coverage in features by agregating pixels as geometries when they are in the same range.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Jts:buffer
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Apply JTS buffer to a geometry.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Math:atan2
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the angle theta from the conversion of rectangular coordinates (x, y) to polar coordinates (r, theta). This method computes the phase theta by computing an arc tangent of y/x in the range of -pi to pi..

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Math:toDegree
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Converts an angle measured in radians to an approximately equivalent angle measured in degrees.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Math:cos
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Returns the trigonometric cosinus of an angle in double.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Referencing:createdb
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Create an epsg database.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Vector:intersection
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Return a new FeatureCollection where each Feature is create from an intersection Geometry

wps:Process.ows:Title: Geotoolkit : Vector:affinetransform
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Apply an affine transformation in Features geometries

wps:Process.ows:Title: Examind : Test.echo
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Echo different input to output.

wps:Process.ows:Title: Examind : Test.param.dependency
wps:Process.ows:Abstract: Param used to test parameter value dependencies.
